column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I got an email about their Burger & a Beer special.  Neither of us felt like cooking
column2: so we ordered two specials and picked them up about 6pm on a random Tuesday night.  We took our feast to Montgomery Park
column3: spread out a socially-distanced picnic blanket and had at it!  The burgers were delicious - a perfect medium rare .... everything you want in a big
column5: indulgent steakhouse burger.  The fries were perfectly crisp and salty.  A fantastic way to experience Bavettes for the first time.
